title: Track fault results in additional travel time

title_translations.zh-Hans: 轨道故障导致行程时间增加
title_translations.ms: Ralat trek mengakibatkan masa perjalanan tambahan
title_translations.ta: தடப் பிழை காரணமாக பயண நேரம் அதிகரித்துள்ளது

updates.text: [NSL] CLEARED: Train service from #Yishun to #Bishan is operating normally now.
[NSEW]Update Estimated10 mins additional traveling time from Yishun to Bishan, towards Marina South Pier due to a track fault.
[NSEW] Estimated15 mins additional traveling time from Yishun to Ang Mo Kio, towards Marina South Pier due to a track fault.
